messages: 180ec7709f5cc09152f473cb9e91d71f (15:25): anyone know how to scons clean yafray?
180ec7709f5cc09152f473cb9e91d71f (15:26): odd, I managed to do it the other day but can't remember how
5b8a284fa662b200c0d6b94314f7fc48 (15:27): Sorry for such a useless answer, but I just wanted to show you that not everyone in this channel idles.
180ec7709f5cc09152f473cb9e91d71f (15:28): still can't seem to get yafrya 0.9 to work with the plugin
5b8a284fa662b200c0d6b94314f7fc48 (15:28): I can't get it to work, at all :(
8690e5336e61480e2d389ec0187b68d4 (15:31): always the one that suits a task best ;)
8690e5336e61480e2d389ec0187b68d4 (15:32): no, i was kidding mostly, i have only x86 hardware, so my choices are limited :)
5b8a284fa662b200c0d6b94314f7fc48 (15:33): _bert, limited to a massive number of OSes.
8690e5336e61480e2d389ec0187b68d4 (15:34): yeah, but only a few are sensible to use
8690e5336e61480e2d389ec0187b68d4 (15:34): many OSes, and most of them without apps
8690e5336e61480e2d389ec0187b68d4 (15:34): that is: apps i don't need :)
5b8a284fa662b200c0d6b94314f7fc48 (15:35): I got Windows for Enemy Territory, because Ubuntu doesn't like it.
8690e5336e61480e2d389ec0187b68d4 (15:35): hehe, i'm playing et under windows as well
8690e5336e61480e2d389ec0187b68d4 (15:35): but mostly because my win box has got the better gfx card and processor
5b8a284fa662b200c0d6b94314f7fc48 (15:36): And I've tried PCBSD, and FreeBSD.
8690e5336e61480e2d389ec0187b68d4 (15:36): oh, and ps and layout software
5b8a284fa662b200c0d6b94314f7fc48 (15:36): Linux is usually faster for Rendering with.
8690e5336e61480e2d389ec0187b68d4 (15:36): maybe, but not with the different cpus and ram i have in my boxes
5b8a284fa662b200c0d6b94314f7fc48 (15:37): So do a dualboot and put Linux on the faster box
8690e5336e61480e2d389ec0187b68d4 (15:37): linux on 1.3 Athlon with 512 mb ram and windows with 2.4 p4 and 1GB ram
8690e5336e61480e2d389ec0187b68d4 (15:37): no, i don't like dual boot
8690e5336e61480e2d389ec0187b68d4 (15:37): it's okay the way it is
8690e5336e61480e2d389ec0187b68d4 (15:38): and well, it's not as if linux was rendering considerably faster, right?
5b8a284fa662b200c0d6b94314f7fc48 (15:38): That's why Pixar have got 800 CPUs run by Linux
8690e5336e61480e2d389ec0187b68d4 (15:39): yeah, i'm not pixar, i can wait a bit ;)
5b8a284fa662b200c0d6b94314f7fc48 (15:39): Do you fancy a game of ET later?
8690e5336e61480e2d389ec0187b68d4 (15:39): i played yesterday and tomorrow i'm writing a 4 hours test, so i won't be playing today, i guess
8690e5336e61480e2d389ec0187b68d4 (15:40): but i'll give you a shout tomorrow, if you like
8690e5336e61480e2d389ec0187b68d4 (15:40): then i can kick yer ass ;p
5b8a284fa662b200c0d6b94314f7fc48 (15:40): Me and my buddy Robert sometimes play
5b8a284fa662b200c0d6b94314f7fc48 (15:41): I used to be one of the best, and I shit you not
5b8a284fa662b200c0d6b94314f7fc48 (15:41): Then I didn't play for a year
8690e5336e61480e2d389ec0187b68d4 (15:41): okay, i guess i'll find out anyway :)
8690e5336e61480e2d389ec0187b68d4 (15:43): well, in blenderchats, there are only few good commands
8690e5336e61480e2d389ec0187b68d4 (15:44): hehe, on quakenet, we got bots who nicely provide that commands :D
